test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X couch)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine)))) (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) (:cons_not (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X washmachine)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X green)))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y bed))) )
test.nl: Do not go to couch. There must be washmachine is closed. There must not be refrigerator is opened. Do not open refrigerator. Do not open washmachine. Do not go to the table. Do not pick the green book. Go to bed. Pick up the cup which is blue. Pick up a remotecontrol. Put a can in the closet. Close the door of the cupboard. Put a book on the bed.
